A VPN for Windows will improve your security while youâ€™re connected to the internet on your PC. Enjoy more secure streaming, browsing, and work with NordVPN.

NordVPN encrypts your internet traffic and hides your IP and physical location. Works on 6 devices at once, on every major platform. With NordVPN, encrypt your online activity to protect your private data from hackers or snoopy advertisers. Enjoy global connectivity along with high-performance speed and secure access to streaming websites, censored content and social networks.
If you pause or turn off the VPN, you may get a quick feedback message asking how the connection went. We promise no tedious questions. It only takes a few clicks and genuinely helps us improve.
